response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth to you, we propose to offer it at a price of $1,150,000. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring you receive a product that exceeds your expectations while allowing us to achieve a fair return on our investment. We believe this price reflects the quality and significance of the product, and we look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
